# [Interview #1052: WOR Signing Table Q&A, Entry #30](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1052#30)

#### Question

Is Shai on Roshar?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Hehehe, good question!

#### Question

Has she already popped up?

#### Brandon Sanderson

She has not already popped up.

#### Question

So she's not a Radiant. Or is she?

#### Brandon Sanderson

You have not seen her on screen yet, other than in her story.
